short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Boost your LinkedIn connections with AI-crafted, personalized invitations for higher approval rates!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Effortlessly personalize your invitations by gathering information directly from profiles. 

Save time and significantly increase your connection success rate with our tool, designed for sending highly personalized invitations.

Our extension ensures your LinkedIn account stays safe by not injecting any code into the platform.
